translation.ja: 〝レイプしたか〞と 尋ねられて―ペイジの母 ロビン･ボーランド ペイジの母 ロビン･ボーランド ペイジの母 ロビン･ボーランド 〝はい〞と答えたんです ペイジの母 ロビン･ボーランド 娘が酔ってたことも―

translation.en: If we should win.

translation.en: Let it be by the code.

translation.en: If we should lose.

translation.en: We stand by the road.

translation.en: Day by day!

translation.en: I don't think I ever thought about teaching them greater life lessons
translation.ja: 人生の教訓を 教える気はなかったが

translation.en: until I had heard a couple boys
translation.ja: 人生の教訓を 教える気はなかったが 何人かが ある女の子の話を してるのを聞き―

translation.en: making comments about a girl, and I said,
translation.ja: 何人かが ある女の子の話を してるのを聞き―

translation.en: All right, we're having a pow- wow now, and I circled everybody up
translation.ja: 話し合いをしようと 皆を集めました 円陣を組ませて言った

translation.en: and I was like, Here's the thing, guys, I'm here to teach you baseball,
translation.ja: 円陣を組ませて言った “俺は野球を教えてるが―”

translation.en: but this isn't the kind of stuff I accept. This isn't what I'm about.
translation.ja: “女の子をおとしめるような 発言は 聞き逃せない”

translation.en: If it's what you're about, that's fine, but that's not what we are gonna be about
translation.ja: “このチームでは 許可しないから―”

translation.en: and you are more than welcome to take yourself out of here.
translation.ja: “嫌なら チームを抜けてくれ”とね

translation.en: After that one incident, something clicked. It really did click.
translation.ja: その出来事があって 何かが変わったんです

translation.en: I don't look to be their father or anything,
translation.ja: 父親役を務める気はないが―

translation.en: but I thought, I want to be part of something bigger than myself.
translation.ja: 自分より大きなものに 貢献したいと思った

translation.en: And maybe I can kind of help them along.

translation.en: Down!
translation.ja: 滑り込め

translation.en: Race ya.

translation.en: There you go. There you go.

translation.en: I really just enjoy watching them grow.
translation.ja: 彼らの成長を見守っています

translation.en: Because in the process, they help me, they teach me a lot more about myself and how I was at that age,

translation.en: and I guess I really start to understand a lot more.
translation.ja: より多くの物事への理解が 深まりました

translation.en: - Atta boy. - Way to go. Way to help yourself, Johnny.  Come on, Johnny.

translation.en: We said our goodbyes to Audrie.
translation.ja: オードリーに お別れを言いました

translation.en: But, I mean, we kept thinking,
translation.ja: でも何が自殺にまで 駆り立てたのか―

translation.en: you know, What could have been so bad that would've driven her to this?
translation.ja: 〝オードリー･テイラー･ ポット〞ずっと 考え続けてるんです

translation.en: After the night of the sexual assault,
translation.ja: 性的暴行に遭った後の―

translation.en: her communications were captured on Facebook Messenger.
translation.ja: 娘のＳＮＳ上でのやり取りが 残っていました

translation.en: Sometimes the person tormenting her was faceless or nameless.
translation.ja: 名前も顔も出さずに 中傷してる人もいたわ

translation.en: We know from what she said in her process of investigating her own crime
translation.ja: オードリーの母シーラ･ ポット娘は何が起きたの か自分で調べていくなか オードリーの母シーラ･ ポット自分の身に 起きたことのせいで―

translation.en: that she felt, because of what had happened to her,
translation.ja: オードリーの母シーラ･ ポット自分の身に 起きたことのせいで―

translation.en: her reputation was ruined. And it was ruined forever.
translation.ja: 自分の身に 起きたことのせいで―

translation.en: She didn't see...
translation.ja: 自分の評判が 落ちたと感じていました

translation.en: any light at the end of the tunnel, any future.
translation.ja: 娘には― 明るい未来が 見えなかったの

translation.en: The boys, they were 15 at the time.
translation.ja: 当時 加害者たちは15歳

translation.en: They were convicted of having child pornography,
translation.ja: 児童ポルノ所持と 性的暴行罪で―

translation.en: um, and committing, um, sexual battery.
translation.ja: オードリーの父 ラリー･ポット 有罪になりました

translation.en: Multiple felonies for each boy.
translation.ja: それぞれが 複数の重罪で有罪です

translation.en: One of 'em got 30 days, one of 'em got 45 days.
translation.ja: １人は懲役30日間 １人は45日間

translation.en: But it was non- consecutive, it was weekend only. Basically, weekend detention.
translation.ja: しかも連続した日ではなく 週末に拘束されるだけです

translation.en: They were never suspended or expelled.
translation.ja: 停学にも退学にも なりませんでした

translation.en: We pretty much knew that, as juveniles, they were gonna get a slap on the wrist.
translation.ja: 未成年だから 刑は軽いとは思っていました

translation.en: All right, I should give you the terms and we can go over them right now.
translation.ja: 条件を確認しましょう

translation.en: Number one, the boys admit the allegations
translation.ja: 第１に“オードリー･ポットに 関する―”

translation.en: as contained in the respected criminal complaints that pertain to Audrie Pott.
translation.ja: 第１に“オードリー･ポットに 関する―” “告訴状に書かれた 性的暴行を認めること” “告訴状に書かれた 性的暴行を認めること” 〝金品によらない 和解契約書〞

translation.en: The second term was that their written apology is public.
translation.ja: 〝金品によらない 和解契約書〞 〝金品によらない 和解契約書〞 第２に“書面による謝罪を 公開すること” 第２に“書面による謝罪を 公開すること”

translation.en: They're sorry for the family's loss, and they basically go through
translation.ja: “ご遺族への謝罪や―” “ラリーとシーラにとって 重要なことを行う”

translation.en: all the things that were important to Larry and Sheila.
translation.ja: “ラリーとシーラにとって 重要なことを行う”

translation.en: The amazing thing about this is, had we have gone to a trial,
translation.ja: もし これが 裁判になっていたら―

translation.en: we would never have been able to get the result that we got.
translation.ja: このような結果は 得られませんでした

translation.en: And who knows how you would...
translation.ja: どんな結果かは…

translation.en: We brought the wrongful death suit because we knew
translation.ja: 少年裁判所で 争うのは やめて―

translation.en: that we weren't gonna get justice in the juvenile court.
translation.ja: 不法死亡訴訟を起こしました

translation.en: I felt that, in the civil suit at least,
translation.ja: 少なくとも民事訴訟なら 事件は公になるし―

translation.en: it would be public and people would know what really happened.
translation.ja: 世間に真相を 知らせることができます

translation.en: It was about them taking responsibility and accountability for their actions.
translation.ja: 彼らには説明責任があるし

translation.en: But ultimately, for us, it was about clearing Audrie's name.
translation.ja: 我々にとっては 娘の汚名をそそぐことだ

translation.en: Yes. Something very wrong happened here. It shouldn't happen to anyone else.
translation.ja: 同じ目に遭う人が 出てほしくありません

translation.en: And the only reason, we all know, because Audrie was extremely private,
translation.ja: 私たちが訴訟に 踏み切れた唯一の理由は―

translation.en: that we could have brought it forward is because she's not with us anymore.
translation.ja: 私たちが訴訟に 踏み切れた唯一の理由は― もう娘はいないから

translation.en: I think, more so than ever before,
translation.ja: 最近 似たような事件が 増えて―

translation.en: this subject is out there, and people are talking about it,
translation.ja: 人々の関心も高まっています

translation.en: and this has to stop.
translation.ja: あってはならない事件よ

translation.en: Part of our settlement in the lawsuit was to...
translation.ja: 〝被告 ジョン･Ｂ 及び ジョン･Ｒ〞 〝被告 ジョン･Ｂ 及び ジョン･Ｒ〞 和解条件の１つが あなた方の― 和解条件の１つが あなた方の―

translation.en: have a 45- minute interview with you guys here.
translation.ja: 45分間のインタビューに 答えることでした 45分間のインタビューに 答えることでした 〝45分の インタビュー撮影〞

translation.en: We had to, um...
translation.ja: 〝45分の インタビュー撮影〞 〝オードリーの 人物像について―〞 僕らは―

translation.en: We had to plead to stuff in order for me to graduate, um, high school.
translation.ja: 〝オードリーの 人物像について―〞 〝オードリーの 人物像について―〞 高校を卒業するために― 〝誤った認識を 広めたと認めます〞 罪を認めなくては ならなかった

translation.en: I've definitely learned from all this.
translation.ja: 〝オードリーは 意識がなかった〞 〝オードリーは 意識がなかった〞 この事件から学びました この事件から学びました この事件から学びました 〝同意の上の 行為ではなかった〞

translation.en: I mean, there's a lot of different things that guys and girls think.
translation.ja: 〝同意の上の 行為ではなかった〞 〝同意の上の 行為ではなかった〞 男と女では― 〝不当な扱いだった〞 〝不当な扱いだった〞 考え方が 大きく違うんだとね 考え方が 大きく違うんだとね

translation.en: What have you learned about girls?
translation.ja: 女性については？ 〝誤ったうわさを 流したことを〞

translation.en: Um, I mean, girls, they gossip, really.
translation.ja: 〝誤ったうわさを 流したことを〞 女っていうのは うわさ好きだよね

translation.en: There's a lot of gossip between girls and, uh, you know, um...
translation.ja: 〝誤ったうわさを 流したことを〞 〝誤ったうわさを 流したことを〞 女同士で うわさし合うんだ 女同士で うわさし合うんだ 女同士で うわさし合うんだ 〝謝罪します〞 〝謝罪します〞 〝謝罪します〞 だけど…

translation.en: guys are more laid- back and don't really care.
translation.ja: 男は もっと大らかで― うわさは気にしない

translation.en: So, that's what I've learned, for sure.
translation.ja: それは確実に学びました

translation.en: I'm curious if there was a moment during that night,
translation.ja: 問題の行動を 起こしている最中に

translation.en: when you knew, This has gone too far.
translation.ja: いたずらにしては 行き過ぎだと―

translation.en: Was there a moment like that for you?
translation.ja: 感じた瞬間は？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ありました

translation.en: Can you talk about that?
translation.ja: 話してくれる？

translation.en: Well, I don't know, I've kind of always been unhappy after that. I mean...
translation.ja: あの事件以降 いつも後味が悪かった

translation.en: It's... it wasn't right and...
translation.ja: 間違ったことをした

translation.en: I knew that, I mean, at the time.
translation.ja: あの時も分かってました

translation.en: There was drinking involved, and it's not like...
translation.ja: 酒を飲んでたけど―

translation.en: we thought everything was okay. I mean, yeah...  Nothing was okay, but...
translation.ja: あれが正しいことだなんて 思ってなかったんです

translation.en: I've always felt, like, not okay about it.
translation.ja: 僕は 毎日― よくないことをしたと 思ってます

translation.en: Like, I don't know, every day or so.
translation.ja: よくないことをしたと 思ってます

translation.en: I don't know what I really thought back then.
translation.ja: 当時の心境は 覚えてないけど―

translation.en: But I just never imagined anything like what happened now.
translation.ja: 当時の心境は 覚えてないけど― 現在の状況は 想像していませんでした

translation.en: I don't know. I didn't imagine my whole life to be changed...
translation.ja: 人生が 変わってしまうってことも

translation.en: Yeah, I don't know. Like, forever changed, so...
translation.ja: 大きく変わってしまった

translation.en: Personally, I don't know what has happened with the boys since that night.
translation.ja: あの夜以降 加害者が どうしてるかは知りません

translation.en: But I have a feeling that, you know,
translation.ja: でも私が思うに―

translation.en: since they haven't had to go through as much crap as I have,
translation.ja: 彼らは私ほど つらい思いを経験してない

translation.en: that they haven't really had time to reflect on who they are as people
translation.ja: 自分がどういう人間か 見直す時間もなく

translation.en: or else they would've stepped forward and taken responsibility.
translation.ja: 罪を認めて 責任をとることもしないわ

translation.en: Honestly, at this point in my life, I can't even recognize the person I was four years ago.
translation.ja: 正直 ４年前の自分が 自分とは思えません

translation.en: At one point in time, I really... I just wanted revenge and that's all I wanted and stuff, but...
translation.ja: 復讐することだけを 考えてた時期もあるけど―

translation.en: I mean, it's a lot harder just living your life full of hate and everything, so I just figured,
translation.ja: 憎しみを抱えて生きるのは あまりに大変です

translation.en: at one point, I was like, I'm kind of done with just being mad at everyone,
translation.ja: ある時点で 皆に対して怒ったり― 常に怒りを抱えるのを やめることにしたんです

translation.en: and being mad all the time, and just being a big ball of emotion.
translation.ja: 常に怒りを抱えるのを やめることにしたんです

translation.en: I wanna be happy and move on with my life. So that's just kind of what I did, I mean...
translation.ja: 私は楽しく過ごして 前に進みたかった

translation.en: And that doesn't always mean just forgetting the past, it just kind of means forgiving the past.
translation.ja: 過去を忘れるんじゃなく 受け入れることでね

translation.en: Daisy Coleman is a recipient of an athletic scholarship
translation.ja: デイジー･コールマンは ミズーリバレー大学の―

translation.en: from Missouri Valley College.
translation.ja: スポーツ奨学金を 取得しました

translation.en: The class of 2015 awards an honorary diploma to Audrie Taylor Pott.
translation.ja: 2015年度のクラスが― オードリー･ポットに 名誉卒業証書を授与します

translation.en: I was way too afraid to report it
translation.ja: 怖くて通報できませんでした

translation.en: because I was bullied, I was ostracized, I was threatened.
translation.ja: 怖くて通報できませんでした 仲間外れにされて 脅されてたから

translation.en: I found my voice when I decided to show my face in my first interview.
translation.ja: 顔を出すと決めたら 発言できました

translation.en: The guys recorded and took photos of the sexual assault,
translation.ja: 彼らは性的暴行の 動画と写真を―

translation.en: and then posted them online.
translation.ja: ネットに投稿

translation.en: Finally, after being misunderstood for years
translation.ja: 何年もの間 誤解され続けて―

translation.en: and going through so much pain and absolutely hating myself,
translation.ja: ひどい苦痛を味わい 自分を嫌いになりました

translation.en: I decided that, if no one's gonna talk about it, then I will.
translation.ja: 誰も話さないなら 私が話すと決めたんです

translation.en: Since my friends didn't stand up for me, I urge other people to speak out,
translation.ja: 他の人たちに 立ち上がってほしい

translation.en: because you can't ignore an army of voices.
translation.ja: 大勢の声なら無視できません

translation.en: And I would like to see people stand up for others who have been assaulted.
translation.ja: 他の被害者を支えてほしい

translation.en: Because the words of our enemies aren't as awful as the silence of our friends. Thank you.
translation.ja: 友人の沈黙のほうが 心ない言葉より つらいから
